Only 2 DeFi projects have solved the TradFi issue üöÄ  $HYPE  provided users a place to trade, which removed barriers of KYC, approvals and simultaneously provided fast settlements to their traders.  $LMTS  has done the same as the leader of prediction markets.   Hype shifted the trading experience in the same way Limitless have shifted the prediction market experience.   By simplifying what a prediction market is and how it operates, by making it permissionless and capturing the migration of TradFi liquidity, Limitless have achieved what nobody else has.  Bringing TradFi onchain and bridging the gap by offering an easy-to-use experience in a normal part of users lives.  Prediction.  #Altcoin Season#
